channel.title: Help plz!
channel.description:
:confused:
please help me...when i try to log on it says than error connecting to server must be down..i have looked at all your topics and none of them can help me.....
1.i have the latest version of Java.
2.i type in the i.p and port correctly.
3. the server i try and connect to does not use Hamachi.
i was thinking that maybe i downloaded wrong Java so can people please post some links to try and help me.
Thank-you.
-----------------------------------------------------------N0vafe------------------------------------------------------------

item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @cccrrraaazzziii cccrrraaazzziii
item.description:
@cccrrraaazzziii wrote:

Well if it’s just a certain individual server, then it maybe just down. And when you say none of the topics helped, your wrong. In the tutorial section, take a look at Mod Taharok’s Ultimate Server Guide, everything that you need to know is in there.

Note~ Try to use less punctuation whilst posting, you’ll get no more attention than anybody else.

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @n0vafe n0vafe
item.description:
@n0vafe wrote:

please do not spam my topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @Zero_Freeze ZeroFreeze
item.description:
@Zero_Freeze wrote:

Why the fuck did you overuse exclamation points in your title?
Overuses of exclamation marks, question marks and smileys point out that the user is a noob.

Noone will help you. Change the title to something sensible.

Read full topic
